body:
Comment 2: 
It'll fix itself once golang.org is Go 1. I don't think it's worth patching it up right
now, because the samples will just be out of sync with the rest of golang.org.

Perhaps we should remove those two sample programs for now?
_Labels changed: added **priority-asap**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
